    Miscellaneous Topics

    misc.Rmd

    • Data for the article “Spatio-Temporal Precipitation Climatology over Complex Terrain Using a Censored Additive Regression Models” (Stauffer et al. 2017). Download precipitation_clim.tar.gz.

    • Precipitation data from the article “A Primer on Bayesian Distributional Regression” (Umlauf and Kneib 2018). Download RainGermany.rds.

    References

    Stauffer, Reto, Jakob W. Messner, Georg J. Mayr, Nikolaus Umlauf, and Achim Zeileis. 2017. “Spatio-Temporal Precipitation Climatology over Complex Terrain Using a Censored Additive Regression Model.” International Journal of Climatology 37 (7): 3264–75. https://doi.org/10.1002/joc.4913.

    Umlauf, Nikolaus, Nadja Klein, Achim Zeileis, and Thorsten Simon. 2021. bamlss: Bayesian Additive Models for Location Scale and Shape (and Beyond). https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=bamlss.

    Umlauf, Nikolaus, and Thomas Kneib. 2018. “A Primer on Bayesian Distributional Regression.” Statistical Modelling 18 (3-4): 219–47. https://doi.org/10.1177/1471082X18759140.
